description:
Starting this week, this show will now be known as "Hijirikawa Shounosuke-san."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shidou Hijirisawa Shounosuke-san / Jidaigeki Osomatsu-san / Joshimatsu-san / Choromatsu Rising
Starting! Hijirisawa Shonosuke-san / Period Drama Osomatsu-san / Girlymatsu-san / Choromatsu Rising
